short_summary: NRC-IRAP requires the services of one Intermediate Rapid eLearning programmer for a period of 2 years.
description: NRC-IRAP requires the services of one Intermediate Rapid eLearning programmer for a period of 2 years (with 3 option years) beginning in August 2023 to support the NRC-IRAP Learning and Development component of the Business Application Transformation Initiative.
full_summary:
# Rapid eLearning Product Programmer Level 2

## Call for Proposals

The National Research Council (NRC) is issuing a call for proposals for the provision of Rapid eLearning Product Programmer Level 2 services.

### Tender Details

*   **Tender Number**: cb-7232-75070794
*   **Notice Number**: 23-58053
*   **Amendment Number**: 4
*   **Tender Closing Date**: August 8, 2023, 14:00 Eastern Daylight Time (EDT)
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: August 15, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: August 31, 2025

### Acquisition Context

The NRC is seeking the services of one Intermediate Rapid eLearning Programmer for a period of two years, with three option years, beginning in August 2023. The selected contractor will support the NRC-IRAP Learning and Development component of the Business Application Transformation Initiative.

### Key Contract Requirements

*   The contractor must have expertise in rapid eLearning development, including the design, development, and delivery of eLearning content.
*   The contractor must have experience working with the NRC-IRAP Learning and Development component of the Business Application Transformation Initiative.
*   The contractor must be able to provide services to the NRC, located at 1200 Montreal Road, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0R6.

### Evaluation Criteria

*   The evaluation will be based on a combined rating of technical merit and price.
*   The contractor with the highest combined rating will be selected.

### Trade Agreements

This procurement is covered under the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
*   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)

### Tender Documents

Tender documents, including the notice of proposed procurement (NPP), the request for proposal (RFP), and the solicitation document, are available on [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca)
